name: Queen Anya Ver.2
description: Cyber baki is an efficient and versatile WhatsApp bot designed to streamline your messaging experience with innovative features and seamless automation.

BotName.description: Enter your desired bot"s name (Ex:- cyber)

Footer.description: Enter a watermark for your bot"s messages (Ex:- ? cyber)

Prefix.description: Enter a specific prefix for your bot, except @, ?, +

Owner_Name.description: Enter a name for bot"s owner (Ex:- cyberx)

Owner_Number.description: Enter owner"s number of the bot (Ex:923457420942-)

MongoDB.description: Get your mongoDB url from mongoDB website

SESSION_ID.description: Get your session id first, if you already have then paste here

Insta.description: Enter your Instagram user Id (Ex:- itz._.devil._.786)

Author.description: Enter a name for sticker"s owner name (Ex:- cyber bot)

PackName.description: Enter a packname for stickers (Ex:- cyber x Stickers)

Web.description: Enter your any social platform link (Ex:- https://github.com/PikaBotz)

ThemeEmoji.description: Enter a desired emoji according to your theme (Ex:- ?)

Warns_Limits.description: Enter the limit of warns for users (Ex:- 3)

Welcome_Msg.description: Welcome message for users in groups, $user for user, $prefix for prefix

Left_Msg.description: Goodbye message for users in groups, $user for user, $prefix for prefix
